text:
<@U26B530N6> I would like to know what happens when HS remove a module that has been already bought (and previously approved by the marketplace team).
Are those modules still available on client portals?
Is HS going to refund those people?
is it possible to push updates to those portals?
-
FYI <@U2PE56HCZ> <@U7B3X71SL> <@UAW8X4H24>

Hi Gonzalo, thank you for asking a great question. If a customer purchases a Marketplace asset that is later removed from the Marketplace, they will continue to have access to the purchase within their portal. Purchased assets from the Marketplace are only removed from a portal if a customer chooses to delete/ uninstall the asset within their own portal.
Customers will not be able to receive updates as the listing will no longer be available within the Marketplace.
